# farr

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of farr is to provide functions and small data sets as used in ["Accounting Research: An Introductory Course"](http://iangow.me/far_book/).

## Installation

You can install the released version of farr from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with:

``` r
install.packages("farr")
```

And the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("iangow/farr")
```
